title: Spinnaker Summit
description: Come learn about Spinnaker by completing codelabs and coding challenges! The following codelabs will step you through using different parts of OSS Spinnaker. These challenges cover a range of topics such as Installation, Integration, Deployment, GitOps and Application delivery. Go to https://go.armory.io/codelabs/spinnaker-summit to find more codelabs you can try at home.
